author: pmouawad
msg: Bug 54778 - HTTP Sampler should not return 204 when resource is found in Cache

author: stefan2
msg: On the authzperf branch: Fix pattern normalization in accordance
Irrespective of whether "**" matches empty paths or not, there is a
subtle yet important difference "/foo" and "/foo/**".  While the first
only _matches_ "/foo" and then _applies_ to the sub-tree _by default_,
the second pattern also _matches_ every single path in the sub-tree.
That way, it will override any previous definitions for paths in that
sub-tree (assuming all have ACLs relevant for the respective user).
